Spread the love with decadent buttercream filling and is frosted with fondant icing for a perfect, smooth look. Black polka twist around the base of the cake and pop out of the top.
Moist vanilla cupcakes topped with a strawberry and cream cheese frosting. (12 pcs)
This stunning Raspberry Rose Cake features layers of soft vanilla sponge cake filled with delicious raspberry puree and butter cream that melts in your mouth.
Chocolate sponge cake sandwiched with Praline Cream, Rum, Strawberry Pulp and coated with Chocolate Ganache.
Indulge your sweet temptations with our very own Rainbow Ribbon Signature Cake.
Celebrate it with unicorn! Our moist chocolate and vanilla cupcakes topped with unicorn. (12 pcs)
This flavourful cake comes with tempting layers of cream and topped with salted butterscotch.
One of the best pick for a wedding, engagement, or anniversary celebrations! This heart-shaped ribbon cake looks so elegant at the same time it will fill up your heart with the taste!
